text: Hey Chris, yes, cameras are off, the simplest way is to create plain box and adjust you camera to it. From what I can see here you have something around 35mm or less and the one on the concept is around  80-120mm. Overall it looks like you are not that far off and model in general looks nice(could please show wireframe too?) so after aligning your camera I would suggest start doing texturing/lookdev
I had my cameras at 50mm as I thought that would be the most likely that they’d used but I think you’re right about a bigger zoom. I can get this sorted today :+1::skin-tone-3:
Hm, try playing with focal length then. maybe try 35 then :slightly_smiling_face:
